Hi again...

I'm looking for methodes from Heritrix 1.2. Actualy I'm searching a
alternative methode for org.archive.crawler.datamodel.CrawlUri "public
void addLinkToCollection(String link, String collectionName)".

Second question: what happend to the CoreAttributeConstants
A_CSS_LINKS, A_HTML_EMBEDS, A_HTML_LINKS, A_HTML_SPECULATIVE_EMBEDS,
A_HTTP_HEADER_URIS and A_JS_FILE_LINKS ? any alternatives?

Third question: In Class CrawlURI the Methode 
public Link getPrerequisiteUri() {
        return (Link) getObject(A_PREREQUISITE_URI);
    }
returns a Link. How can I get the prerequisitURI from this Linkobject?
By using the Methode Link.getDestination() or Link.getSource() ?

Sorry for all this questions, but I have to update not selfe written
code, not that funny :) ... (a specialised webcrawler for
www.geometa.info)

Thanks for your help, Adrian
